name: Tung Le
about:
Founded as Consumer Finance Division of Vietnam Prosperity Joint-Stock Commercial Bank (VPBank), after 9 years of establishment, FE CREDIT has become one of the top market leader in consumer finance industry in Vietnam.
With nearly 19,000 employees and a diversified network of over 13,000 points of sales nationwide operated in a reliable collaboration with more than 9,000 partners, proudly delivers a range of multi-accessible, flexible and effective financial solutions to nearly 10 million of Vietnamese through consumer lending products and services.

experiences.institution_name: OCB - Ngân Hàng TMCP Phương Đông
experiences.description:
* All activities of recruitment for back-office.
* All activities of recruitment for back-office.

- Executing full-cycle recruitment activities as per recruitment plans according to approved headcount and recruitment requests from Dept./ Center/ Division (mainly for Back office)
- Providing support & ensuring effectively in filling opening positions
- Following up with hiring manager to determine recruitment needs, the effectiveness of recruiting plans, processes and implementation.
- Providing guide line & supporting new comers in terms of company culture, policies, structure & other info needed.
- Cooperating with other departments in HRM (HRBP, Reward & Policy, Organization Development, C&B) in order to implement all HR policies/ deliver information smoothly following up the compliance with Labor law, trade union rules, internal procedures, etc.
- Carrying out recruitment activities within budget such as posting job advertisement in website, participating in job fairs, making relationship and connecting to universities/ potential candidates... in order to build up employer brand and varied candidate pool as well.

FE CREDIT - VAY TIÊU DÙNG TÍN CHẤP
FE CREDIT - VAY TIÊU DÙNG TÍN CHẤP
Founded as Consumer Finance Division of Vietnam Prosperity Joint-Stock Commercial Bank (VPBank), after 5 years of establishment, FE CREDIT successfully transferred all consumer finance operations to the new independent company – VPBank Finance Company Limited, abbreviated as VPB FC (Brand FE CREDIT) in February, 2015.

With nearly 14,000 current employees, FE CREDIT has served more than 2,000,000 customers and cooperated with over 3,500 partners at over 5,000 POS in 63 provinces nationwide.

experiences.description:
Career Market - Thông tin về tuyển dụng, tìm việc các doanh nghiệp Nhật Bản tại Việt Nam
Nếu bạn đang tìm việc hay muốn chuyển việc, vào làm việc tại các doanh nghiệp Nhật tại Việt Nam, hãy yên tâm giao phó cho chúng tôi. Chúng tôi đăng tải nhiều thông tin tuyển dụng và công việc từ thành phố Hồ Chí Minh tới Hà Nội.
